            position: 0,

        expression: NullsafePropertyFetch {
            target: Variable(
                SimpleVariable(

                        span: Span {

                            position: 6,
                        },
                        name: "$a",
                    },
                ),
            ),

                line: 1,
                column: 9,
                position: 8,
            },
            property: Identifier(
                SimpleIdentifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier {
                        span: Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 12,
                            position: 11,
                        },
                        value: "b",
                    },
                ),
            ),
        },
        ending: Semicolon(

                line: 1,

                position: 12,
            },
        ),
    },
]
